name: editVoucherEntriesDeleteALine

testSteps.description: Given that I'm logged in to Voucher Entry page

children.description: When i open page from sidebar menu: {Accounts Payable,Voucher Entries,Voucher Entry}

testSteps.description: Then the Payment Information form and its contents should show up
When I set the Supplier to '118173'

exception.message:
Expected condition failed: waiting for visibility of all elements located by By.xpath:  .//div[contains(@class, 'form-item')][span[text()='Supplier']]//div[contains(@class, 'Select-option')] | .//div[contains(@class, 'form-item')][span[contains(text(), 'Supplier')]]//div[contains(@class, 'Select-option')] (tried for 120 second(s) with 100 milliseconds interval)

testSteps.description: When I set the 'Invoice Number' to 'gPx9o18cql'
When I set the Currency to 'USD'
When i click on continue button
When I select the first Bank Account and click 'Submit' button if modal exist
When I set the Gross Amount to '10000'
When i click on continue button
Then the 'GL Distribution' form and its contents should show up
When I fill up the last row line using Account Number: '91100', Line Description: 'Test', Amount: '5000', Cost Center: '1MAN400', Gen Obj: 'AFGHAI', AOE: 'YAO', Line Ref: 'Test123'
When I click 'Add Line' button
When I fill up the last row line using Account Number: '91100', Line Description: 'Test', Amount: '5000', Cost Center: '1MAN400', Gen Obj: 'AFGHAI', AOE: 'YAO', Line Ref: 'Test123'
When I click on 'Save' button
Then the voucher entry successfully created modal and its contents should show up
Given that I'm logged into 'Voucher Entry Review' page
Then the 'Voucher Entry Review' page and its contents should show up
When I set the 'Batch Number' using saved value
When I click on 'Search' button
Then the 'Review Voucher' search result should show up
When I select the first voucher entry
When I click on 'Edit' button
When I click 'Payment Amount' button
Then the 'Payment Amount' form should show up
When I click on 'Continue' button
Then the 'GL Distribution' form should show up
When I click on the 'Show Next' button
When i click on delete line button of the first line
When i click on delete line button of the first line
Then the lines should be empty
When I click on 'Show Previous' button
When I click 'Add Line' button
When I fill up the last row line and balance the amount using Account Number: '91100', Line Description: 'Test', Cost Center: '1MAN400', Gen Obj: 'AFGHAI', AOE: 'YAO', Line Ref: 'Test123'
When I click on 'Save' button
Then the voucher entry successfully created modal and its contents should show up
When i click on modal review button
When I select the first voucher entry
When I click on 'View Entries' button
Then the 'Voucher Entry' modal should show up
Then the number of lines in voucher entry modal should be only one

title: Edit voucher entries delete a line
